title: "You are guaranteed one of your selected roles..."
body:
"You are guaranteed one of your selected roles this game because you recently filled or played support"

Can anyone clarify? I thought if you chose two roles in draft you were given one of the two roles that you chose (i.e. if I chose adc or mid, I'd get either adc or mid)...but to me that means you may not actually get the roles chosen.

replies.body: If you pick a very low priority role, sometimes the system has to put you in Fill so that it can make even matches. When it does this it makes sure it doesn't happen next time.
I think that the matchmaker just tries to match you into your primary, but I'm not sure tbh.
